deterministic_formula: Count cards where subtype in type_line_subtypes
Count cards with restriction_filter=TYPE_SUBSET and type_subset includes subtype and payoff primitives (lords/cast payoffs/ETB payoffs)
why: Separates real typal shells from incidental density

deterministic_formula: Count tutors where restriction_filter includes TYPE_SUBSET and type_subset includes subtype
Count token makers that produce creature tokens where created subtype includes subtype (if DB token metadata available) else approximate via oracle phrase match
why: Typal token production matters for go-wide tribes

deterministic_formula: Count cards with subtype 'Shapeshifter' AND keyword Changeling (if available)
why: Prevents false positives via universal typal hacks
